MultiFrameStructure Properties

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Node»Structure. View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
Frame CountReturns the number of frames in the structure. Details
Frame Selector RectReturns the bounds of the selector label of the structure. Details
Frames[]Returns an array of references to the frames of the structure. Details
Visible FrameReturns the index to the visible frame of the structure, where 0 is the first frame. Details
